  <article id="keywords-article-XDHIS8S6" class="keywords-article">
    <h1>Keywords</h1>
    
  </article>
  <article id="abstract-article-XDHIS8S6" class="abstract-article">
    <h1>Scientific abstract</h1>
    Pray is a poetic, observational and slow documentary film where filmatic style is used in an attempt to put the audience in a state of flow, thus allowing them the possibility to reach an epiphany.
  </article>
